description:
While two dozen carbon capture projects are proposed in Louisiana, figuring out exactly where companies plan to inject carbon dioxide underground for storage is a bit of a mystery. That’s because a state law passed in 2021 regulating carbon capture includes a provision allowing companies to claim a wide range of project information — including […]

The post Where Was Exxon Planning to Inject CO2 in Louisiana? It’s a Trade Secret. appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Where Was Exxon Planning to Inject CO2 in Louisiana? It’s a Trade Secret.
